WavesTravelThrough.Description: Make a wave from both ends of the slinky so that they meet in the middle.  Have one of your teammates try sending a small pulse toward a big pulse.  Ask yourself if the waves are passing through each other or bouncing off.

MultipleChoice.a: the waves pass through each other
MultipleChoice.b: the waves bounce off each other

TensionAndSpeed.Description: Students increase tension of the slinky by pulling more of the spring in at around 20 ft, and comparing the loose spring to tighter spring.

MultipleChoice.a: A looser slinky, the waves travel slower
MultipleChoice.b: A looser slinky, the waves travel faster
